definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be red (Ar. h.amara II. dye red, h.umrah;un redness, reddish brown (appar. skin-colour) so Thes MV Ba:NB 192 al.)—only

definitions.title: Pe‘al‘al
definitions.body: Pf. pass. [[פָּנַי חֳמַרְמְרֻ֠ה]] Job 16:16 my face is reddened from weeping.—La 1:20, La 2:11 v. I. [[חמר]].
